sentences: In 2018 , area equipped for full control irrigation for Georgia was 472 thousand ha .
Area equipped for full control irrigation of Georgia increased from 411 thousand ha in 1996 to 472 thousand ha in 2018 growing at an average annual rate of 3.52 % .
Between 1992 and 2018 , Georgia average precipitation in depth remained stable at around 1,024 mm per year .
In 2020 , population aged 75+ years for Algeria was 1,109.6 thousand persons .

Between 1971 and 2020 , population aged 75+ years of Algeria grew substantially from 118.43 to 1,109.6 thousand persons rising at an increasing annual rate that reached a maximum of 6.21 % in 1991 and then decreased to 3.97 % in 2020 .
